title: Some Extensions of Finite Sum Theorem
authors: Wen Huang, Song Shao, Tianyi Tao, Rongzhong Xiao, and Ningyuan Yang
abstract:
The paper gives some multi-dimensional extensions of Hindman's finite sum
theorem. In particular, by the method of this paper, we prove that for any
finite coloring of $\mathbb N$, there are $a,b\in \mathbb N$ such that there
exist (infinitely many) pairs $(x,y),(u,v)\in \mathbb N^2$ such that the two
sets $\{ax,ay,xy,a(x+y)\}$ and $\{u+b,v+b,uv+b,u+v\}$ are monochromatic.
